717024700. Anglia converted to Protestantism

Province of Anglia — Not random

Triggered by

Action A of 717024702 - AI_EVENT for The Pope
Action A of 717024703 - AI_EVENT for The Pope
Action A of 717024704 - AI_EVENT for The Pope

Description

As a result of the spread of the reformation, the province is now considered as being of the evangelic-lutheran faith.

Actions

A. OK

  • Religion in Anglia changes to protestant
